About Me

I am a full-stack developer with over 4 years of experience in creating dynamic, responsive, and modern web applications using technologies like React, Spring Boot, and Tailwind CSS.

Who I Am

I am a passionate software developer who loves to code and creatively solve problems. With a deep interest in technology, I constantly seek to learn new programming languages and frameworks. I believe in writing clean, efficient code and collaborating with teams to build impactful software solutions.

My Mission

My mission is to build efficient, scalable, and impactful web solutions that help businesses grow and innovate. I strive to combine technology with creativity to create user-centric applications that solve real-world problems and enhance user experiences.

Fun Fact

In my free time, I love hiking and exploring nature. This not only helps me stay inspired and refreshed but also allows me to disconnect from the digital world and appreciate the beauty around me. Nature fuels my creativity and motivates me to tackle new challenges in my projects.

Projects

Hotel Reservation System

The Online Hotel Booking System (OHBS) is a comprehensive web-based application designed to streamline the process of hotel booking for customers and hotel management. This system provides an efficient platform for users to search for hotels, view room availability, make bookings, and manage reservations online.

View Case Study (see On GitHub)

Health Insurance System

The Online Health Insurance Management System (OHIMS) is a web-based application developed using Spring Boot, aimed at automating health insurance management processes. It features user management, policy management, claim submissions, and document handling.

View Case Study (see On GitHub)

Airline Reservation System

The Airline Reservation System is a comprehensive web application designed to facilitate flight bookings, user management, and flight management in a streamlined and efficient manner. This system aims to provide a user-friendly interface for customers to book flights easily while allowing administrators to manage users, flights, and bookings effectively.

View Case Study (see On GitHub)
